issue.title: [CF 1334] Unit Range goes from Precise to imprecise sometimes
issue.body:
Hi there.
I have a problem with the "Unit Range" meter.It goes sometimes from "Precise" to "Imprecise" without a solid reason or at least i couldnt find it. I noticed it after i first startet wow and logged in or after i go into my demon class hall.I tried but i couldnt find a way to reproduce the problem and say thats the reason why it happens.

If it is imprecise it stays imprecise and if i move the bar while it is imprecise it stays always red. Its going to funktion normally until i reload.
I dont know if it is an addon conflict or just a display bug and it wont effect the range calculation.

I did a screenshot of it when it is imprecise(red)and correct(green)


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork | Imported from CurseForge issue #1334 | Raw
